long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U:
Supported in IBM Rational Functional Tester 10.5.4 and earlier versions.

IBM Rational Functional Tester for Google Chrome™

IBM® Rational® Functional Tester is an object-oriented automated functional testing tool that tests HTML, Java, Microsoft Windows, Microsoft .NET, Microsoft Visual Basic, Microsoft Silverlight, Eclipse, SAP, Siebel, Adobe Flex, Ajax, Dojo, GEF and Sybase PowerBuilder applications. You can also test Adobe PDF documents, and IBM zSeries®, IBM iSeries®, and IBM pSeries® applications.

With IBM Rational Functional Tester, you can test HTML applications that are loaded in Google Chrome browsers in Microsoft Windows environments.

You can use the IBM Rational® Functional Tester for Google Chrome™ extension to change the port number for the web server that is used when testing applications loaded in Google Chrome browsers.

IBM Rational Functional Tester can be integrated with IBM® Rational® Quality Manager. You can execute functional test scripts from IBM Rational Quality Manager.
long.cs,hu,pl,ru,tr:
IBM Rational Functional Tester for Google Chrome™

IBM® Rational® Functional Tester is an object-oriented automated functional testing tool that tests HTML, Java, Microsoft Windows, Microsoft .NET, Microsoft Visual Basic, Microsoft Silverlight, Eclipse, SAP, Siebel, Adobe Flex, Ajax, Dojo, GEF and Sybase PowerBuilder applications. You can also test Adobe PDF documents, and IBM zSeries®, IBM iSeries®, and IBM pSeries® applications.

With IBM Rational Functional Tester, you can test HTML applications that are loaded in Google Chrome browsers in Microsoft Windows environments.

You can use the IBM Rational® Functional Tester for Google Chrome™ extension to change the port number for the web server that is used when testing applications loaded in Google Chrome browsers.

IBM Rational Functional Tester can be integrated with IBM® Rational® Quality Manager. You can execute functional test scripts from IBM Rational Quality Manager.
long.de:
IBM Rational Functional Tester für Google Chrome™

IBM® Rational® Functional Tester ist ein objektorientiertes automatisiertes Funktionstesttool, mit dem HTML-, Java-, Microsoft Windows-, Microsoft .NET-, Microsoft Visual Basic-, Microsoft Silverlight-, Eclipse-, SAP-, Siebel-, Adobe Flex-, Ajax-, Dojo-, GEF- und Sybase PowerBuilder-Anwendungen getestet werden. Darüber hinaus können Adobe PDF-Dokumente sowie IBM zSeries®-, IBM iSeries®- und IBM pSeries®-Anwendungen getestet werden. 

Mit IBM Rational Functional Tester können Sie HTML-Anwendungen testen, die in Google Chrome-Browsern in Microsoft Windows-Umgebungen geladen sind. 

Mit IBM Rational® Functional Tester Extension für Google Chrome™ können Sie die Portnummer für den Web-Server ändern, der beim Testen von Anwendungen verwendet wird, die in Google Chrome-Browser geladen werden. 

IBM Rational Functional Tester kann in IBM® Rational® Quality Manager integriert werden. Sie können Funktionstestscripts aus IBM Rational Quality Manager ausführen.
long.es:
IBM Rational Functional Tester for Google Chrome™

IBM® Rational® Functional Tester es una herramienta de creación de pruebas funcionales que sirve para probar aplicaciones HTML, Java, Microsoft Windows, Microsoft .NET, Microsoft Visual Basic, Microsoft Silverlight, Eclipse, SAP, Siebel, Adobe Flex, Ajax, Dojo, GEF y Sybase PowerBuilder. También se pueden verificar documentos Adobe PDF y aplicaciones IBM zSeries®, IBM iSeries® e IBM pSeries®. 

Con IBM Rational Functional Tester puede probar aplicaciones HTML que se cargan en navegadores Google Chrome en entornos de Microsoft Windows. 

IBM Rational® Functional Tester Extension for Google Chrome™ sirve para cambiar el número de puerto del servidor web que se utiliza al probar aplicaciones cargadas en navegadores Google Chrome. 

IBM Rational Functional Tester se puede integrar con IBM® Rational® Quality Manager. También puede ejecutar scripts de prueba funcional desde IBM Rational Quality Manager.
long.fr:
IBM Rational Functional Tester for Google Chrome™

IBM® Rational® Functional Tester est un outil de test fonctionnel automatisé orienté objet qui teste des applications HTML, Java, Microsoft Windows, Microsoft .NET, Microsoft Visual Basic, Microsoft Silverlight, Eclipse, SAP, Siebel, Adobe Flex, Ajax, Dojo, GEF et Sybase PowerBuilder. Vous pouvez également tester des documents Adobe PDF ainsi que des applications IBM zSeries®, IBM iSeries® et IBM pSeries®.

Avec IBM Rational Functional Tester, vous pouvez tester des applications HTML qui sont chargées dans des navigateurs Google Chrome dans des environnements Microsoft Windows.

Vous pouvez utiliser l'extension IBM Rational® Functional Tester for Google Chrome™ pour changer le numéro de port pour le serveur Web qui est utilisé lors du test d'applications chargées dans des navigateurs Google Chrome.

IBM Rational Functional Tester peut être intégré à IBM® Rational® Quality Manager. Vous pouvez exécuter des scripts de test fonctionnel depuis IBM Rational Quality Manager.
long.it:
IBM Rational Functional Tester per Google Chrome™

IBM® Rational® Functional Tester è uno strumento di test funzionale automatizzato orientato agli oggetti che consente di verificare le applicazioni HTML, Java, Microsoft Windows, Microsoft .NET, Microsoft Visual Basic, Microsoft Silverlight, Eclipse, SAP, Siebel, Adobe Flex, Ajax, Dojo, GEF e Sybase PowerBuilder. È inoltre possibile eseguire il test di documenti PDF Adobe e di applicazioni IBM zSeries®, IBM iSeries® e IBM pSeries®.

Con IBM Rational Functional Tester, è possibile verificare le applicazioni HTML caricate nei browser Google Chrome in ambienti Microsoft Windows.

È possibile utilizzare l'estensione di IBM Rational® Functional Tester per Google Chrome™ per modificare il numero di porta del server Web utilizzato durante la verifica delle applicazioni caricate nei browser Google Chrome.

IBM Rational Functional Tester può essere integrato con IBM® Rational® Quality Manager. È possibile eseguire gli script di test funzionale da IBM Rational Quality Manager.
long.ja:
IBM Rational Functional Tester for Google Chrome™

IBM® Rational® Functional Tester は、HTML、Java、Microsoft Windows、Microsoft .NET、Microsoft Visual Basic、Microsoft Silverlight、Eclipse、SAP、Siebel、Adobe Flex、Ajax、Dojo、GEF および Sybase PowerBuilder アプリケーションをテストする、オブジェクト指向の自動化された機能テストツールです。Adobe PDF 文書および IBM zSeries®、IBM iSeries®、IBM pSeries® アプリケーションをテストすることもできます。

IBM Rational Functional Tester を使用して、Microsoft Windows 環境で Google Chrome ブラウザーにロードされた HTML アプリケーションをテストできます。

IBM Rational® Functional Tester for Google Chrome™ 拡張機能を使用して、Google Chrome ブラウザーにロードされたアプリケーションをテストするときに使用する Web サーバーのポート番号を変更できます。

IBM Rational Functional Tester は IBM® Rational® Quality Manager と統合できます。IBM Rational Quality Manager から機能テスト・スクリプトを実行できます。
long.ko:
Google Chrome™ 용 IBM Rational Functional Tester

IBM® Rational® Functional Tester는 HTML, Java, Microsoft Windows, Microsoft .NET, Microsoft Visual Basic, Microsoft Silverlight, Eclipse, SAP, Siebel, Adobe Flex, Ajax, Dojo, GEF 및 Sybase PowerBuilder 애플리케이션을 테스트하는 객체 지향의 자동화된 Functional Test 도구입니다. Adobe PDF 문서 및 IBM zSeries®, IBM iSeries®, IBM pSeries® 애플리케이션도 테스트할 수 있습니다. 

IBM Rational Functional Tester를 사용하면 Microsoft Windows 환경의 Google Chrome 브라우저에 로드된 HTML 애플리케이션을 테스트할 수 있습니다. 

IBM Rational® Functional Tester for Google Chrome™ 확장기능을 사용하면 Google Chrome 브라우저에 로드된 애플리케이션을 테스트할 때 사용한 웹 서버의 포트 번호를 변경할 수 있습니다. 

IBM Rational Functional Tester는 IBM® Rational® Quality Manager와 통합이 가능합니다. IBM Rational Quality Manager의 Functional Test 스크립트를 실행할 수 있습니다.
long.pt_BR:
IBM Rational Functional Tester para Google Chrome™

O IBM® Rational® Functional Tester é uma ferramenta de teste automatizado orientada a objetos que testa aplicativos HTML, Java, Microsoft Windows, Microsoft .NET, Microsoft Visual Basic, Microsoft Silverlight, Eclipse, SAP, Siebel, Adobe Flex, Ajax, Dojo, GEF e Sybase PowerBuilder. Também é possível testar documentos Adobe PDF e aplicativos IBM zSeries®, IBM iSeries® e IBM pSeries®.

Com o IBM Rational Functional Tester, é possível testar aplicativos HTML que são carregados em navegadores Google Chrome em ambientes Microsoft Windows.

É possível usar a extensão do IBM Rational® Functional Tester for Google Chrome™ para alterar o número da porta do servidor da web usado ao testar aplicativos carregados em navegadores Google Chrome.

O IBM Rational Functional Tester pode ser integrado ao IBM® Rational® Quality Manager. É possível executar scripts de teste funcional a partir do IBM Rational Quality Manager.
long.zh_CN:
适用于 Google Chrome™ 的 IBM Rational Functional Tester

IBM® Rational® Functional Tester 是面向对象的自动化功能测试工具，用于测试 HTML、Java、Microsoft Windows、Microsoft .NET、Microsoft Visual Basic、Microsoft Silverlight、Eclipse、SAP、Siebel、Adobe Flex、Ajax、Dojo、GEF 和 Sybase PowerBuilder 应用程序。还可测试 Adobe PDF 文档以及 IBM zSeries®、IBM iSeries® 和 IBM pSeries® 应用程序。

通过 IBM Rational Functional Tester，您可以测试 Microsoft Windows 环境中的 Google Chrome 浏览器中装入的 HTML 应用程序。

可使用 IBM Rational® Functional Tester for Google Chrome™ 扩展来更改当测试 Google Chrome 浏览器中装入的应用程序时使用的 Web 服务器的端口号。

IBM Rational Functional Tester 可与 IBM® Rational® Quality Manager 集成。可从 IBM Rational Quality Manager 执行功能测试脚本。
long.zh_TW:
適用於 Google Chrome™ 的 IBM Rational Functional Tester

IBM® Rational® Functional Tester 是一種物件導向的自動化測試工具，能測試 HTML、Java、Microsoft Windows、Microsoft .NET、Microsoft Visual Basic、Microsoft Silverlight、Eclipse、SAP、Siebel、Adobe Flex、Ajax、Dojo、GEF 與 Sybase PowerBuilder 應用程式。您也可以測試 Adobe PDF 文件，以及 IBM zSeries®、IBM iSeries® 與 IBM pSeries® 應用程式。

有了 IBM Rational Functional Tester，您可以在 Microsoft Windows 環境中測試載入至 Google Chrome 瀏覽器的 HTML 應用程式。

您可以使用 IBM Rational® Functional Tester for Google Chrome™ 延伸來變更在測試載入至 Google Chrome 瀏覽器的應用程式時所使用的 Web 伺服器埠號。

IBM Rational Functional Tester 可整合 IBM® Rational® Quality Manager。您可以從 IBM Rational Quality Manager 執行功能測試 Script。
